DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare findings generated by CT-based autopsy (Virtopsy) with conventional autopsy and clinical diagnoses. Therefore all patients dying while receiving treatment in the Department of Intensive Care Medicine will be undergo virtopsy and, if relatives give informed consent conventional autopsy.
DOC.brief_title: Value of CT-based Autopsy Compared With Conventional Autopsy in ICU Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of the study is to compare findings generated by computertomography-based autopsy (Virtopsy) with conventional autopsy and clinical diagnoses. Therefore all patients dying while receiving treatment in the Department of Intensive Care Medicine will be undergo virtopsy and, if relatives give informed consent conventional autopsy.
DOC.criteria: Patients dying in the Department of Intensive Care Medicine while receiving treatment during the study period
